solution_line_template: So the added weight made it {total_weight_stack}*{heavier_percentage}=<<{total_weight_stack}*{heavier_percentage}={added_weight}>>{added_weight} pounds heavier
So when he lowered the weight it was {total_weight_stack}+{added_weight}=<<{total_weight_stack}+{added_weight}={felt_weight}>>{felt_weight} pounds
